name: BattleQuad
description:
BattleQuad is a game of reflexes, local multiplayer for two players, you must be touch the colors point and the player that obtain more points in a time, it will win the match.

Actually the game have two stages, its random the stage when you clicked in button play.

Controls:

- Player1

Up , Down, Left and Right

- Player 2 

WASD
